title: Report Missed Trash Collection
description: A resident reports that their trash was not picked up on the scheduled collection day.

tasks.description: Identify the resident's address and confirm their scheduled collection day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the resident's address and that today was their collection day.

tasks.description: Check for any known service disruptions or delays in the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the system and finds no reported disruptions.

tasks.description: Create a service request for a special pickup and inform the resident it will be collected the next business day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the missed pickup and provides a clear resolution timeline.
